endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all scheduled appointments.
Book a new appointment with a healthcare professional.
Update the details of an existing appointment using its ID.
Cancel an existing appointment using its ID.
Check the available time slots of a specific healthcare professional.
Retrieve a list of all registered healthcare professionals.
Retrieve the details of a specific patient using their ID.
Update the details of an existing patient record.
Send a notification to a patient regarding their appointment.
Retrieve a list of all healthcare facilities.
